thread.title: Matt Damon Dresses as Tom Brady on ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’
thread.title_full: Matt Damon Dresses as Tom Brady on ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Matt Damon Dresses as Tom Brady on ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’
text:
Super Bowl LI MVP Tom Brady made a surprise appearance on last night’s episode of Jimmy Kimmel Live! — sort of.
Matt Damon, who has infamously never appeared on Kimmel’s talk show , snuck on dressed as his favorite athlete, the GOAT, Tom Brady.
“I’m mostly happy just to be here on the show, I’m on the show,” Damon said when asked whether the recent Super Bowl victory was the most satisfying.
For some time now, Matt Damon’s lack of an appearance on Jimmy Kimmel Live! has been a running joke for the show, with Kimmel stating “Apologies to Matt Damon, we ran out of time.” towards the end of almost every episode.
Congrats, Matt — er, Tom, or whatever.
